channel.title: Mary Knize
channel.description: I'm a front-end web developer and indie game developer. JavaScript, HTML, CSS, PHP, C#, Unity 3D. I learn new things every day.

item.title: Today I Learned - Blogging Edition
item.description:
Today I learned that itâ€™s nearly impossible to decide on just one blogging platform. Despite the fact that I hardly ever blog, I want to learn how they all work. WordPress, Ghost, and now Jekyll.

I also learned that Ruby Gems are a lot like Node. Package managers, I like them.
